graphql.query:
query GetProduct {
    getAllProducts {
        _id
        productname
        description
        price
        unitsavailable
        category
        subcategory
        company
        images
        likes
        dislikes
        createdAt
        updatedAt
    }
}

query GetProduct {
    getAllProducts {
        _id
        productname
        description
        price
        unitsavailable
        category
        subcategory
        company
        images
        likes
        dislikes
        createdAt
        updatedAt
    }
}

mutation AddProduct {
  addProduct(
    input: {
      productname: "HP Omen 16"
      description: "High-performance gaming laptop with RTX 4070"
      price: 135000
      unitsavailable: 18
      category: "electronics"
      subcategory: "laptop"
      company: "HP"
    }
  ) {
    _id
    productname
    description
    price
    unitsavailable
    category
    subcategory
    company
    images
    likes
    dislikes
    createdAt
    updatedAt
  }
}

query GetOrdersByUser {
    getOrdersByUser(nondelivered: false) {
        _id
        userId
        totalPrice
        address
        contactNumber
        orderDate
        estimatedDelivery
        isDelivered
        deliveryDate
        paymentMethod
        isPaid
        transactionId
        orderStatus
    }
}
